title: What are some challenges you think the next generation will face? Do you think they will solve them or create more? - Quora

response.answer_text: The biggest challenge will be forging a society that will embody the values of the new world: justice, globalism, environmental stewardship, and inclusivity. Whether they will or will not solve them will depend on a large part on the world we leave them. For inspiration in dire times: quora/q/new success models.

Whatever the challenges be… they will create more. Last two-three centuries’ generations are looking in the wrong direction. They always looking for an answer in the outside. So, things will get worse until someone changes direction —almost 180º —.
